body.p: 1. Warrior among David’s mighty men who were known as “the thirty.” Bahurim was his hometown (2 Sm 23:31; 1 Chr 11:33).
2. Jehoaddah’s son, a descendant of King Saul through Jonathan (1 Chr 8:36; cf. 9:42, “Jadah’s son”).
3. Father of Jeziel and Pelet from Benjamin’s tribe (1 Chr 12:3). Possibly the same as #1 above.
4. Adiel’s son, whom King David put in charge of the palace treasuries (1 Chr 27:25).
